definition: father's elder brother/senior/paternal elder uncle/eldest of brothers/respectful form of address/Count, third of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]
to hurry/to rush/to run quickly/to elope
variant of 奔[ben1]/variant of 奔[ben4]
Buddhist nun/(often used in phonetic spellings)
to let go/to cast/to let loose/to discharge/to give expression to

sentences.english: The Turks began to pour into the Peloponnesos in some numbers.
sentences.chinese: 土耳其人开始大量地涌入伯罗奔尼撒地区。

sentences.english: In Chapter three I analyze the Graeco-Persian relations after the Peloponnesian War.
sentences.chinese: 第三章分析了伯罗奔尼撒战争后的希波关系。

sentences.english: The contradiction between the city eventually led to the outbreak of the Peloponnesian War.
sentences.chinese: 城邦之间的矛盾终于导致伯罗奔尼撒战争爆发。

sentences.english: Plato was born into an aristocratic Athenian family, and he grew up during the Peloponnesian War.
sentences.chinese: 柏拉图生于雅典贵族家庭，在伯罗奔尼撒战争中长大。

sentences.english: View of the Peloponnesian Peninsula, where customs clearance is a hot spring?
sentences.chinese: 远眺伯罗奔尼撒半岛，哪里是温泉关？

definition: Pompeium, Roman town in Bay of Naples destroyed by eruption of Vesuvius in 79/Pompey (Roman general)
Rhode Island, US state/Rhodes, an island of Greece
